Tuesday, January 23, 2018 19:42
% of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents.
In the nuclear information war, we all lose by definition. Many of us have all accepted our roles in the information war and those roles are usually reduced to passive absorption of whatever is reported and no real motivation to seek out more information about a certain topic that should be a concern for you, your family and your community. What is more alarming is how the War Pigs are developing their own Combat Swinetology which includes the idea of The Pentagon acquiring smaller nukes and using them much more often. On tonight’s show, Clyde Lewis talks about COMBAT SWINETOLOGY – THE IMPORTANCE OF BEING A WAR PIG.
